title: Gains (Capstone Project)
description: M.E.R.N stack app that allows visitors to create, track, and complete crowd-sourced exercise challenges to receive badges. (Hosted on render.com please give it a few minutes to become active)

title: Pass Genny
description: M.E.R.N stack app that allows users to generate a password and store up to 5 passwords. (Hosted on render.com please give it a few minutes to become active)

title: Peety Coffee Counter
description: Slack bot that tracks a weekly coffee consumption leaderboard using slack user information and slash commands

title: Stockify
description: Email notifier that alerts a user when a product is in stock by web scraping HTML

title: Foogle
description: Recreation of Google homepage and search results using HTML/CSS
